pros: Amazing work culture, good work life balance, amazing people

job_title: Director of Fundraising and Marketing in Sydney
pros: Great cause, wonderful caring people. Inspirational every day meeting families and the kids - their spoken language is amazing.
cons: Always moving at a fast pace. Amazing for a small charity but be prepared to work fast and hard.

pros: Collaborative environment, friendly people, dedicated staff

review_title: Friendly office culture and for a good cause
pros: WFH options, 9-day fortnight and salary packaging (NFP benefits). Welcoming and supportive environment which values employees,
cons: Long hours due to the 9-day fortnight deal.
